column7: Kaing Guek Eav alias Duch died at the Khmer-Soviet Friendship Hospital. ------Duch was convicted by the ECCC Trial Chamber on 26 July 2010 for crimes against humanity and war crimes committed at Tuol Sleng Prison and sentenced to 35 years in prison. The prosecutor appealed
column8: and The Supreme Court Chamber ruled on 3 February 2012 to sentence Duch to life in prison.------On June 6
